title: Yahoo Lifestyle
text: Although you cant rewrite your personal history, you can use it to alter your current path in a positive manner. Intense emotions are triggered today if an event sparks challenging memories, even distant ones from your childhood. Be gentle with your heart; theres no reason to steamroll over your feelings. Write down your reflections or share them with people you trust. You are likely to gain valuable insights on past traumas, but only if you shine your light of awareness on them. Rev. Martin Luther King, Jr. wrote, Darkness cannot drive out darkness; only light can do that. Hate cannot drive out hate; only love can do that. Get Your Complete Cosmic Profile
